news_title_1: Real Madrid yiteguye guhatanira FIFA Club World Cup 2025
news_body_1: Real Madrid izitabira irushanwa rya FIFA Club World Cup 2025 rizabera muri Amerika nyuma yo kwegukana Champions League. Carlo Ancelotti yavuze ko ari amahirwe yo gushimisha abafana.
news_title_2: Manchester City yizeye intsinzi mbere y’irushanwa
news_body_2: Ikipe ya Manchester City iyobowe na Pep Guardiola yiteguye guhatanira igikombe cy’isi. Abafana biteze byinshi kuri Haaland na De Bruyne muri Amerika.
